item.title: Introduction
item.description: Greetings! Welcome to my DevLog! I will documenting my progress in My First Game Jam here in addition to sharing a live stream! Feel free to follow along with me. Motivations I have always had a creative itch, but never the drive to push myself to follow through with anything. Throughout my life I have dabbled in various outlets, but have failed to remain consistent in my practice. I have always needed some sort of system in place to keep my self accountable so that I continue moving forward.
